title: 2012-12-18 笔记
htmlText:
兼容的强制换行样式

<div class="content">
    <p class="wrap">No matter how long, i wrap...</p>
</div>

.content {
    /* Important! */
    width: 200px;
}
.wrap {
    word-break: break-all;
    word-wrap: break-word;
}
